```{r}
movies <- read.csv("data/movies.csv")
useful <- c("popularity", "budget", "revenue", "genres", "genresAmount", "director", 
                      "runtime", "productionCountry", "productionCountriesAmount", "releaseDate", "voteCount", 
                      "voteAvg", "actorsPopularity", "actorsAmount", "castWomenAmount", "castMenAmount")
movies_new <- subset(movies, select = useful)
summary(movies_new)
```
